  • Available QML modules

Available QML modules

The following modules are bundled with Pegasus, and can be safely included in QML files:

  • QtQuick
  • QtQuick.Layouts
  • QtQuick.Particles
  • QtQuick.Window
  • QtCanvas3D
  • QtGamepad
  • QtGraphicalEffects
  • QtMultimedia
